column4: What's the best way to cancel a CD extraction with Rhythmbox? I don't want to damage anything.
why not let it finish then just delete

less efficient, don't want to write it to disk, may not have enough space on the disk, etc. seems i'm not the only one complaining about it: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/rhythmbox/+bug/223023
well you did ask about the safe option; you could kill the process I suppose
